alert.note: Alert for Macomb; Monroe; Oakland; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 6:17PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Gusty winds out ahead of the main line of showers will impact portions of northeastern Monroe, Wayne, eastern Oakland and Macomb Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 610 PM EDT, gustier winds in excess of 40 mph continue to be observed out ahead of the main line of showers which currently stretch from Birch Run to Jackson. Latest ob was 46 mph at Ann Arbor at 555 PM. Additional gusty winds are possible when the shower line crosses the area. Line movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Warren, Livonia, Troy, Southfield, Taylor, St. Clair Shores, Pontiac, Novi, Romulus, Mount Clemens, New Baltimore, Flat Rock, Richmond, Grosse Pointe, Romeo, Oxford, Carleton, Downtown Detroit, Canton and Detroit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
